allow:
Bash(# Search for Stripe-related variables in all .env files
echo ""Searching for Stripe-related variables...""
for file in .env.dev .env.qa .env.qa2 .env.sb .env.sb2 .env.sb3 .env.prod .env.e2e-on-gha; do
    if [ -f ""$file"" ]; then
        echo -e ""\n=== $file ===""
        grep -E ""^(NEXT_PUBLIC_STRIPE_RETURN_ORIGIN|NEXT_PUBLIC_STRIPE_PUBLISHABLE_KEY|STRIPE_ACCOUNT_FOR_CHARGE|NEXT_PUBLIC_STRIPE_ACCOUNT_FOR_CHARGE|STRIPE_ACCOUNT_FOR_TICKET|NEXT_PUBLIC_STRIPE_ACCOUNT_FOR_TICKET|STRIPE_ACCOUNT_FOR_GENERAL|NEXT_PUBLIC_STRIPE_ACCOUNT_FOR_GENERAL|STRIPE_SECRET_KEY|STRIPE_WEBHOOK_SECRET)="" ""$file"" || echo ""No Stripe variables found""
    fi
done)

Bash(# Verify that Stripe-related variables have been removed
echo ""Verifying removal of Stripe-related variables...""
for file in .env.dev .env.qa .env.qa2 .env.sb .env.sb2 .env.sb3 .env.prod .env.e2e-on-gha; do
    if [ -f ""$file"" ]; then
        echo -e ""\n=== $file ===""
        if grep -q -E ""^(NEXT_PUBLIC_STRIPE_RETURN_ORIGIN|NEXT_PUBLIC_STRIPE_PUBLISHABLE_KEY|STRIPE_ACCOUNT_FOR_CHARGE|NEXT_PUBLIC_STRIPE_ACCOUNT_FOR_CHARGE|STRIPE_ACCOUNT_FOR_TICKET|NEXT_PUBLIC_STRIPE_ACCOUNT_FOR_TICKET|STRIPE_ACCOUNT_FOR_GENERAL|NEXT_PUBLIC_STRIPE_ACCOUNT_FOR_GENERAL|STRIPE_SECRET_KEY|STRIPE_WEBHOOK_SECRET)="" ""$file""; then
            echo ""ERROR: Stripe variables still found!""
            grep -E ""^(NEXT_PUBLIC_STRIPE_RETURN_ORIGIN|NEXT_PUBLIC_STRIPE_PUBLISHABLE_KEY|STRIPE_ACCOUNT_FOR_CHARGE|NEXT_PUBLIC_STRIPE_ACCOUNT_FOR_CHARGE|STRIPE_ACCOUNT_FOR_TICKET|NEXT_PUBLIC_STRIPE_ACCOUNT_FOR_TICKET|STRIPE_ACCOUNT_FOR_GENERAL|NEXT_PUBLIC_STRIPE_ACCOUNT_FOR_GENERAL|STRIPE_SECRET_KEY|STRIPE_WEBHOOK_SECRET)="" ""$file""
        else
            echo ""âœ“ All Stripe variables successfully removed""
        fi
    fi
done)
